| History                 = '''The Green Cross''' is a multi-million dollar charity organization, specially charted to help out at the sites of [[Hulk]]-related disasters. Feeling partly responsible for the creation of the [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]] due to daring [[Richard Jones (Earth-616)|Rick Jones]] to enter the testing area for the first [[Gamma Bomb]], [[Gary Swanson (Earth-616)|Gary Swanson]] founded the Green Cross and dedicated his life to fixing every disaster related to a [[Glossary:Gamma Radiation|Gamma-irradiated creatures]].{{r|She-Hulk Vol 2 4}}
